step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with fists closed and arms drawn in. Keep those muscles tight as you inhale.
Nicely done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Remember to exhale as you relax.
Great work opening your fingers and extending your arms to shoulder height. Exhale and relax your muscles.
You're doing well with the arm extension. Focus on keeping your elbows slightly bent and wrists straight.
Good job completing the first rep! Ensure your arms are fully extended horizontally.
Excellent start to your second rep! Keep those fists closed and muscles tight as you inhale.
Well done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Remember to exhale and relax.
Great job extending your arms to shoulder height. Keep exhaling and relaxing your muscles.
You're maintaining good form with the arm extension. Focus on a smooth, controlled movement.
Fantastic job completing both reps! You successfully opened your fingers and extended your arms horizontally.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists closed and muscles tight when you inhale, then open your fingers and relax as you exhale. Focus on extending your arms fully to shoulder height.
